display.title: ipython notebook
display.label: ipythonnotebook
display.description: IPython provides a rich architecture for interactive computing with

start.content:
if ! test -f /home/app/.have_profile
 then
    ipython profile create nbserver
    touch /home/app/.have_profile
cd /home/app
 ipython profile create nbserver

pass=`echo "from IPython.lib import passwd
passwd('_Engines_Environment(notebook_password)')
exit() " | ipython  --no-confirm-exit --no-color-info --no-pprint --colors=NoColor |grep sha1 `


cat ~/.ipython/profile_nbserver/ipython_notebook_config.py | sed "/^# c.NotebookApp.password.*/s//c.NotebookApp.password=$pass/" > /tmp/confg
cp /tmp/confg ~/.ipython/profile_nbserver/ipython_notebook_config.py
fi

PID_FILE=/tmp/ipython_notebook.pid
export PID_FILE
. /home/trap.sh
host=`hostname`
ip=`grep $Hostname /etc/hosts |cut -f1 `
ipython notebook   --ip=$ip --NotebookApp.password=$pass --config ~/.ipython/profile_nbserver/ipython_notebook_config.py &

pid=$!
echo $pid >$PID_FILE
touch /engines/var/run/flags/startup_complete
wait
rm /engines/var/run/flags/startup_complete
